title: The Moth Radio Hour: Antidepressants and Anthony Hopkins
description:
This week, scientist abruptly stops taking his medication and an actor lands a part in a big film. This week’s episode is hosted by Jay Allison and Rachel Dratch. The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.

Storytellers: Ben Lillie, Josh Broder
itunes:subtitle: This week, a scientist abruptly stops taking his medication and an actor lands a part in a big film.
itunes:author: The Moth
itunes:summary: A scientist abruptly stops taking his medication, an actor lands a part in a big film, and a woman visits her home country during a time of political unrest.
